text: Take bala ha’la -- ''darabara-ghare prabesa karo.’’ Kinta yakhana se ta dekhala se etike mane karala eka bisala jalasaya, ara se tara kapara tene tulalo. Tini balalena -- ''eti'i darabara ghara, masrna kara hayeche kaca diye.’’ Se balale -- ''amara prabhu! Ami nihsandeha amara a‌tmara prati an'yaya karechi, ara ami sula'imanera sange bisbajagatera prabhu allah‌ra prati atnasamarpana karachi.’’
